# Citation Style Language (csl) Files
## Added to Team PSD from www.Zotero.org/styles

### In RMarkdown files (.Rmd) use the links to the www.zotero.org/styles for citation formatting
### To use custom TeamPSD style files download them to your computer

# List of Citation Styles

1. American Psychological Association 6th edition 
- file: "apa.csl"
- link: https://www.zotero.org/styles/apa

2. American Psychological Association 6th edition ("doi:" DOI prefix) 
- file: "apa-old-doi-prefix.csl"
- link: https://www.zotero.org/styles/apa-doi-prefix

3. American Psychological Association 6th edition (curriculum vitae, sorted by descending date)
- file: "apa-cv.csl"
- link: https://www.zotero.org/styles/apa-cv

4. American Psychological Association 6th edition (annotated bibliography with abstract)
- file: "apa-annotated-bibliography.csl"
- link: https://www.zotero.org/styles/apa-annotated-bibligraphy

5. American Psychological Association 6th edition (single-spaced bibligraphy)
- file: "apa-single-spaced.csl"
- link: https://www.zotero.org/styles/apa-single-spaced
